cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

cmake_policy(GET CMP0048 HAS_CMP0048)
if (HAS_CMP0048)
	project(matio VERSION 1.5.14 LANGUAGES C CXX)
else (HAS_CMP0048)
	project(matio LANGUAGES C CXX)
endif (HAS_CMP0048)

#set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Release CACHE STRING "Choose the type of build." FORCE)
